text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This transmits revised IRM 2.3.37, IDRS Terminal Responses, Command Code UPTIN for the GUF System.
Editorial changes have been made throughout this IRM.
IRM 2.3.37, dated June 08, 2020, is superseded.
LMSB, SBSE, TEGE, and W&I.
Table of Contents
2.3.37.1 Program Scope and Objectives
Command Code UPTIN for the GUF System 2.3.37 page
Scope and (
) This section gives step-by-step guidance for the retrieval of unpostable infor- mation for IDRS (Integrated Data Retrieval System) Command Code UPTIN (
) Purpose: This transmits IRM
, IDRS Terminal Responses, Command Code UPTIN. (
) Audience: All IRS business units. (
) Program Owner: AD/Submission Processing (
) Primary Stakeholders: Wage & Investment (W&I), Large & Mid-Size Business (LMSB), Small Business Self Employed (SBSE), Tax Exempt and Government Entities (TE/GE) (
) Program Goals: Command Code UPTIN displays all open and closed Un- postable records for a speciﬁc TIN and will maintain the Unpostable records, for research purposes, for
days after it is closed. Each unpostable record sorted by TIN, MFT, Tax Period and Transaction Code. The data for UPTIN is updated after GUF
daily run has been completed.
This section gives step-by-step guidance for the retrieval of unpostable infor- mation for IDRS (Integrated Data Retrieval System) Command Code UPTIN

Program Goals: Command Code UPTIN displays all open and closed Un- postable records for a speciﬁc TIN and will maintain the Unpostable records, for research purposes, for 90 days after it is closed. Each unpostable record is sorted by TIN, MFT, Tax Period and Transaction Code. The data for UPTIN is updated after GUF21 daily run has been completed.
This Page Intentionally Left Blank
